pageTitle: London Underground Service Update - Metronet Strike Suspended Wednesday, September 5 - 1245hrs

title.title: London Underground Service Update - Metronet Strike Suspended Wednesday, September 5 - 1245hrs

texts: Nine out of twelve Tube lines are now running services with work ongoing to restore services on the remaining three lines.
"We are pleased the RMT has suspended its strike action at Metronet, following the clarification of all jobs and pensions issues.

"We will now work to provide the best possible Tube service on Wednesday. However, as the strike was suspended so late last night, it will take time for us to restore a full service on all Underground lines today.
"Passengers should check before they travel to see how Tube services are running. Our staff will be available to provide travel advice and assistance on Wednesday."
The latest service update on all lines can be found at the end of this press release.
Passengers can check before travelling via the following options:
